message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this truly unique product. Given its immense value, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I propose a starting price of $1,800,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, Alice, but I'm looking to make a more reasonable offer. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate you countering and recognizing the inherent value of this product.  While I can't accept $1,400,000, I'm willing to move closer to your offer. How about we meet halfway at $1,600,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1,500,000. Can you consider this offer?
